property.name: CONNECTED
property.description: There is an undirected path between every two nodes (places or transitions).

property.name: CONSERVATIVE
property.description: For each transition, the sum of valuations (i.e., "inscriptions" in PNML terminology) for all input arcs equals the sum of valuations for all output arcs. Note : if there are no "multiple" arcs, the valuation of each arc is equal to one.

property.name: DEAD_PLACES
property.description: One or more place(s) have no token in any reachable marking.

property.name: DEAD_TRANSITIONS
property.description: One or more transition(s) cannot fire from any reachable marking.

property.name: DEADLOCK
property.description: There exists a reachable marking from which no transition can be fired.

property.name: EXTENDED_FREE_CHOICE
property.description: All transitions sharing a common input place have the same input places.

property.name: LIVE
property.description: For every transition, from every reachable marking, one can reach a marking in which the transition can fire.

property.name: LOOP_FREE
property.description: No transition has an input place that is also an output place.

property.name: MARKED_GRAPH
property.description: Every place has exactly one input transition and exactly one output.

property.name: NESTED_UNITS
property.description: Places are structured into hierarchically nested sequential units. The definition of Nested-Unit Petri Nets (NUPN) is available from http://mcc.lip6.fr/nupn.php

property.name: ORDINARY
property.description: All arcs have multiplicity one (i.e., are unity weighted).

property.name: REVERSIBLE
property.description: From every reachable marking, there is a transition path going back to the initial marking.

property.name: SAFE
property.description: In every reachable marking, there is no more than one token on each place.

property.name: SIMPLE_FREE_CHOICE
property.description: All transitions sharing a common input place have no other input place.

property.name: SINK_PLACE
property.description: One or more places have no output transitions.

property.name: SINK_TRANSITION
property.description: One or more transitions have no output places.

property.name: SOURCE_PLACE
property.description: One or more places have no input transitions.

property.name: SOURCE_TRANSITION
property.description: One or more transitions have no input places.

property.name: STATE_MACHINE
property.description: Every transition has exactly one input place and exactly one output place.

property.name: STRONGLY_CONNECTED
property.description: There is a directed path between every two nodes (places or transitions).

property.name: SUBCONSERVATIVE
property.description: For each transition, the sum of valuations for all input arcs equals or exceeds the sum of valuations for all output arcs.
